metadata.Name: Arabic to English Transliteration Dataset
metadata.Description: This dataset is a new Arabic to English transliteration corpus extracted from Wikipedia, containing names of various origins.
metadata.Paper Title: Sequence-to-sequence neural network models for transliteration
metadata.Venue Name: Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing
metadata.Abstract: Transliteration is a key component of machine translation systems and software internationalization. This paper demonstrates that neural sequence-to-sequence models obtain state of the art or close to state of the art results on existing datasets. In an effort to make machine transliteration accessible, we open source a new Arabic to English transliteration dataset and our trained models.
